title: Unable to connect to login queue since windows updated
body: Ever since my windows 10 updated Thursday night  have not been able to connect to login queue. Has anyone else had this problem tried every fix they suggest from the hex tech repair tool. to completely uninstalling and reinstalling league making sure i gave it administrator rights and everything . only other weird thing i have noticed is i can log on to the website but cannot send a support request ever time i try it gives me a connection error. Any thoughts ladies and Gentleman.

replies.body: I've gotten in touch with Player Support for you, and hopefully can get this resolved for you soon.

This is exactly my dilemma! I've tried all sorts of solutions across the forum AND for the hextech repair tool and everything listed under login issues. I can't submit a support ticket either because it won't let me. I hope this gets seen soon, I've had the issue for close to a week now and am looking for a fix, I hope this extra comment will help this thread be seen...{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

Hey DangoDoof (this made me laugh) and robochomp!

We're looking into both of your accounts and don't immediately spot anything out of the ordinary, so we'd like to look into this a little more! I'm not sure if this is still happening to you robochomp, but I saw your recent post Dango so I'm assuming it's still happening to you.

I'd like to gather both of your LeagueClient logs. The easiest way to grab these and send them to me is:
1. Download the [Hextech Repair tool ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool)(if you haven't already) and run it so that it gathers your logs 
2. Email support@riotgames.com and attach these logs (this will create a ticket for you without having to log in)
3. Let me know what your ticket number is so I can go and grab it :D

Sorry in advance for how frustrating this is. Hope to hear from you soon o/

Oh man, is it great to finally hear from someone! I've sent the logs via email, my ticket number is #30482854.

Thanks, by the way, for the compliment on my name lol

I hope this helps resolve the issue :)
Thank you! I'll follow up with you in the ticket after I share your logs with some engineers. Hopefully we can get this sorted soon!
